TopicTitle: Why have fireworks cannons not been added to KSP1 console edition yet?

Articles.Content: Have they planned on adding them sometime soon?
Apparently not. That's been three years console players have been promised new stuff, but nothing came out.
Whoever was responsible for announcing 1.12 etc for KSP 1 console is either a liar or complicit in a lie.

Out of all the things the console version lacks, you want that useless gimmick?

Priorities.
